backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining surgery case types, checklist defaults, user profiles, and authorized CRUD/query methods for cases and profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme color variables and applying global background and text styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, profile setup flow, and rendering the case list view within themed layout.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with query cache clearing and login retry logic.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal for first‑time users to enter and save their name, with validation and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines the seven checklist items with defaults and provides helpers to generate default checklists and remaining tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Displays a surgery case card with key details, remaining tasks, and edit/delete actions.
Provides a dialog for creating or editing a surgery case with validation and checklist editing.
Lists all surgery cases with search, CSV import/export, and a dialog for creating new cases.
Simple search input component for filtering surgery cases.
Renders editable checklist items for a surgery case.
Handles exporting cases to CSV and importing cases from CSV with validation and save logic.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: Reusable date input with calendar popover selection.
Implements CSV export and import logic for surgery cases, including parsing, validation, and mapping.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the CSV headers and row structure for case import/export.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Filters SurgeryCase items by matching text fields, species/sex labels, dates, and incomplete checklist items against a query.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines CaseFormData and provides species and sex option lists for case creation/editing.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Implements validation and date parsing/formatting helpers for case fields including species, sex, and dates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and surgery cases.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark blue‑themed UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging Tailwind and clsx class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with InternetIdentityProvider and React Query setup.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: JSON describing the app’s project state, including summary, features, architectural notes, and pending feature requests.
